If God is God, and if God created everything, then I think He also must have created the devil musn't He? The question now is, if God is God and if God created everything, and if by creating everything God created the devil, was the devil always a devil, or was he something else and then became the devil?

 
 
 In the Jewish faith, "shatian" or the accusor is an angel whose job it si to provide bad choices to people, so they are able to make GOOD choices, and therefore lead a more sanctified life. You can't 'choose' good unless you have an alterntive.
